meanings.sent1: The committee reauthorizes the funding for the project.
meanings.sent2: The government reauthorizes the use of certain medications.
meanings.sent3: The library reauthorizes my membership after I returned the overdue books.
meanings.sent4: The principal reauthorizes the student council's budget for the school year.
meanings.sent5: The city council reauthorizes the construction of the new park for the community.

meanings.sent1: The court reauthorizes the search warrant for further investigation.
meanings.sent2: The board reauthorizes the CEO to make important decisions.
meanings.sent3: The teacher reauthorizes the student to retake the exam after studying more.
meanings.sent4: The parent reauthorizes the teenager to use the car after setting new rules.
meanings.sent5: The manager reauthorizes the team to proceed with the project plan.
